text: Love Is on the Air is an American crime drama movie. It is directed by Nick Grinde. It was Ronald Reagan's first movie. The movie also stars June Travis, Hal B. Wallis, and Jack L. Warner. It was released on October 2, 1937. Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Nick Grinde
title: Love Is on the Air
